scriptedEmail.name: Idea Vote Notifications
scriptedEmail.description: Raises notifications to an Idea Author when a vote occurs.
scriptedEmail.bodyScript:
$core_v2_language.FormatNumber($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.TotalVotes)

$core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Votes')

$context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Status.Name
#format($core_v2_language.GetResource('Body_Status')) #token('idea_name_link') #set($url = $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Url) #if ($url) $context_v1_email.Context.Idea.Name #end #token('up_votes') $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.YesVotes) #token('down_votes') $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($context_v1_email.Context.Idea.NoVotes) #end
scriptedEmail.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Body_Status">Your Idea, {idea_name_link}, has {up_votes} up vote(s) and {down_votes} down vote(s).</resource> <resource name="Body_Votes">vote(s)</resource> <resource name="Footer">You received this email because your content was voted on by another user. You can disable these notifications {settings_link}.</resource> <resource name="Settings">here</resource> <resource name="Subject">Vote update on {idea_name}</resource> <resource name="Header">Vote update on {idea_name}</resource> </language>
